article: When my mom came back home from the hospital with the twins, I was excited at the very beginning. I couldn't  _  to play with them and be the best sister ever. Then they'd pull out their  _  and just as I was about to say "cheese", they'd run over to my perfect little brothers and take photos of them. At that time I was thinking ," Why can't I be  _  again so I can be the one getting all the  _  " When my aunt Camille got married,my mom  _  a long time finding the perfect clothes for them. The best part was when my aunt and I took my twin brothers by the hands and  _  them some dance moves, helping them was such a cool thing,I  _  then what a huge waste of time feeling jealous !  _  comes when you kick over your shoes and enjoy life!
